metadata.name: AI Math Tutor (Probability)
metadata.author: Card Game Engine
metadata.description: Your personal AI tutor for probability questions. Patient, encouraging, and always ready to explain concepts in different ways until they make sense!

decks.note: No deck needed - pure chat interface

cards.note: This is a conversational AI tutor - no cards are used

instructions.overview: Chat with an AI tutor who specializes in probability. Ask questions, get explanations, and learn at your own pace with a patient, encouraging tutor.
setup: Choose an AI model (Nova Micro is fastest)
Look at the starter prompts for inspiration
Type your question in the chat box
gameplay: Type any probability question or concept you want to understand
Press Enter or click Send to ask your question
Ask follow-up questions if you need more help
Copy responses if you want to save them
Click 'New Chat' to start a fresh conversation
Watch the token counter - start a new chat if it gets close to the limit
instructions.winning: Success means understanding probability concepts! The tutor will explain things in multiple ways until you get it. Don't be afraid to say 'I still don't understand' - that's what tutors are for!
